<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Parse barcode from image"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/files/barcode/parse"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Uploads an image containing a barcode and extracts the encoded data. Supports common barcode formats including QR codes, Code 128, Code 39, UPC, EAN, and Data Matrix.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Image file** - Prepare an image file (PNG, JPG, GIF) containing a visible barcode. The barcode should be clearly visible and not obscured.

**Workflow Example**
1. Capture or obtain an image containing a barcode (e.g., asset tag photo)
2. Upload the image to this endpoint using multipart/form-data
3. Receive parsed barcode text and format type in response
4. Use the extracted value to search for assets: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with the barcode as AssetTag filter

**Supported Formats**: QR Code, Code 128, Code 39, UPC-A, UPC-E, EAN-13, EAN-8, Data Matrix, PDF417

**Notes**: For best results, ensure the barcode is well-lit, in focus, and occupies a significant portion of the image. Returns empty result if no barcode is detected.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Barcode parsed successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["Item","StatusCode"],"properties":{"Item":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Result of a barcode parsing operation.","properties":{"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the barcode was successfully parsed"},"Text":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The text content extracted from the barcode"},"Format":{"allOf":[{"type":"integer","description":"Barcode format enum from Spark.Shared.Enums.BarcodeFormats.","oneOf":[{"enum":[1],"title":"AZTEC","description":"Aztec 2D barcode format"},{"enum":[2],"title":"CODABAR","description":"CODABAR 1D format"},{"enum":[4],"title":"CODE_39","description":"Code 39 1D format"},{"enum":[8],"title":"CODE_93","description":"Code 93 1D format"},{"enum":[16],"title":"CODE_128","description":"Code 128 1D format"},{"enum":[32],"title":"DATA_MATRIX","description":"Data Matrix 2D barcode format"},{"enum":[64],"title":"EAN_8","description":"EAN-8 1D format"},{"enum":[128],"title":"EAN_13","description":"EAN-13 1D format"},{"enum":[256],"title":"ITF","description":"ITF (Interleaved Two of Five) 1D format"},{"enum":[512],"title":"MAXICODE","description":"MaxiCode 2D barcode format"},{"enum":[1024],"title":"PDF_417","description":"PDF417 format"},{"enum":[2048],"title":"QR_CODE","description":"QR Code 2D barcode format"}],"title":"BarcodeFormats"}]}},"title":"BarcodeResult"}]},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"BarcodeResultResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
